snippet.title: Shadows of the Damned: Hella Remastered - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadows of the Damned: Hella Remastered is coming this Halloween!
Pre-orders are GO!
Releasing on PlayStation 4/5, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PC (Steam), and Switch on October 31st, 2024.
SEE YOU IN HELL!

#SotDHR #ShadowsOfTheDamned #grasshoppermanufacture #suda51 #grasshopperarchives

[OFFICIAL SITE]
https://www.grasshopper.co.jp/
[TWITTER]
https://twitter.com/Grasshopper_EN
https://twitter.com/Grasshopper_JP
[GHM ONLINE STORE]
https://grasshopperonline.store/en
[TWITCH]
https://www.twitch.tv/grasshoppermanufacture

©GRASSHOPPER MANUFACTURE INC.
